prompt: menga kodni kozdan kechirib chiq va qanday ozgartirishlar kiriitishimizni maslahat ber

suggestion.title: Code Review and Improvement Suggestions
suggestion.summary: The code review identified potential areas for improvement, including fixing existing test errors and optimizing performance. Below are the suggested changes.

diffs.unified_diff:
--- src/example_code.py
+++ src/example_code.py
@@ -10,7 +10,7 @@
 def example_function(x):
     # Original logic
     result = x * 2
-    if x > 10:
+    if x >= 10:
         result += 5
     return result

--- tests/test_example_code.py
+++ tests/test_example_code.py
@@ -5,7 +5,7 @@
 def test_example_function():
     # Test for x less than 10
     assert example_function(5) == 10
-    # Test for x greater than 10
+    # Test for x equal to or greater than 10
     assert example_function(10) == 25
     assert example_function(15) == 35
